Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Galatea Sea Palace in Aci Castello (Aci Trezza), you'll be convenient to Casa del Nespolo Museum and Norman Castle. This 4-star residence is within close proximity of Lachea Island and Basilica di San Sebastiano.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 125 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Pay movies provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Bathrooms feature showers, bidets, and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Head down to the water and enjoy a day at the private beach, or take advantage of other recreational amenities, which include a seasonal outdoor pool. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the residence's room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), limo/town car service, and express check-in. Event facilities at this residence consist of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the residence's room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Galatea Sea Palace in Aci Castello (Aci Trezza), you'll be convenient to Casa del Nespolo Museum and Norman Castle. This 4-star residence is within close proximity of Lachea Island and Basilica di San Sebastiano.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Casa del Nespolo Museum - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Lachea Island - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Norman Castle - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Basilica di San Sebastiano - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi
Palazzo Comunale - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Puppet Theatre and Museum - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Church of the Holy Apostles Peter and Paul - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Piazza del Duomo - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Cathedral of Acireale - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Palazzo Musmeci - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Piazza San Domenico - 4.6 km / 2.8 mi
I Portali Shopping Centre - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Le Zagare Shopping Center - 5.7 km / 3.6 mi
Butterfly House - 8.2 km / 5.1 mi
Leucatia Castle - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi

The preferred airport for Galatea Sea Palace is Catania (CTA-Fontanarossa) - 14.4 km / 8.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Hotel Galatea Sea Palace is Catania (CTA-Fontanarossa) - 14.1 km / 8.8 mi.
